Author: (Drury, 1773)
Field_marks: Lacks stigma#Red spot on hindwing tip
Diagnosis: Lower appendage elongate with a prominent hook at the apex.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Selys, 1873
Field_marks: Stigma present#Lower appendage very short#Red hindwing patch truncated#Postclypeus metallic blue-green
Local_distribution: Pacific slope at 300-1330 m (Sardinal to Monteverde); 600-1200 m on Atlantic slope (Rio Chiquito, Penas Blancas).
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: (Rambur, 1842)
Field_marks: Lacks stigma#Wing tips smoky#Thorax not metallic red
Local_distribution: From 600 to 1600 m on Atlantic slope (Rio Chiquito, Penas Blancas);  Pacific slope at 1100-1600 m (San Luis, Monteverde).
Habitat: Small and medium streams in open areas; larger streams and rivers in forest; tolerant of polluted water.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Selys, 1878
Field_marks: Lacks stigma#Wing tips smoky#Thorax metallic red
Comments: Collected on the Pacific slope below Monteverde near Guacimal and Sardinal.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Selys, 1853
Field_marks: Stigma present#Lower appendage very short#Large size
Local_distribution: Atlantic slope at 1100-1600 m (Penas Blancas); Pacific slope at 1100-1600 m (San Luis).
Habitat: Small to medium clear streams in forest.
Comments: Overlaps broadly with H. cruentata, but prefers more forested rivers and streams.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Selys, 1879
Field_marks: Lower appendages very short#Red hindwing patch extended into a point
Comments: Not yet recorded from the Monteverde region.
Credits: Image Copyright  (©) David Wagner 2005, Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Hagen in Selys, 1853
Field_marks: Smoky wing tips#Elongate, rachet-shaped lower appendage
Local_distribution: Atlantic slope at 600 m; Pacific slope at  75-620 m (Sardinal to Finca San Luis).
Comments: Common on some streams in the lowlands below Monteverde.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Calvert, 1901
Local_distribution: Not yet recorded from the Monteverde region.
Comments: Not yet recorded from the Monteverde region. No specimens seen yet.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: Hagen in Selys, 1853
Field_marks: With stigma#Smoky wing tips#Straight lower appendage
Habitat: Very small streams in forest, especially where overgrown with shrubs and large herbs.
Comments: Collected once in the Penas Blancas River valley.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.

Author: (Drury, 1773)
Field_marks: Wing tips smoky#Red patch on hindwing pointed#Lower appendage curved upward
Local_distribution: Not yet recorded from the Monteverde region.
Habitat: Medium streams at 50-200 m in open areas.
Comments: Locally common on the Peninsula de Nicoya.
Credits: Images and Text Copyright (©) 2005, William A. Haber, www.cs.umb.edu/efg.
